sentences.sentence: It would be hypocritical of me to have a church wedding when I don't believe in God.
sentences.translation: 我不信上帝却到教堂举行婚礼，那就是我的虚伪了。

sentences.sentence: I would just like to say that this is the most hypocritical thing I have ever heard in my life.
sentences.translation: 我只想说这是我一生中听到过的最虚伪的事。
这种意识形态是虚伪的。
